body:
I'm trying to perform a grid based daylight simulation. The issue Is that the process get stuck at the oconv stage (see image).

I tried to follow this discussion:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honey-bee-i...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honey-bee-issue)

but no use.

I'll appreciate any help on this.

Thanks,

Gal
